Uses of Class
main.java.neat.config.NEATConfigBuilder

Packages that use NEATConfigBuilder
Package Description
main.java.neat.config  

  • Uses of NEATConfigBuilder in main.java.neat.config

    Methods in main.java.neat.config that return NEATConfigBuilder
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setActivationDefault​(ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION activationDefault)
    Sets the default activation function for nodes created during evolution.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setActivationMutationRate​(double activationMutationRate)
    Sets the probability of mutating a node's activation function.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setAggregationDefault​(AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION aggregationDefault)
    Sets the default aggregation function for nodes created during evolution.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setAggregationMutationRate​(double aggregationMutationRate)
    Sets the probability of mutating a node's aggregation function.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setBiasAdjustingRate​(double biasAdjustingRate)
    Sets the probability of adjusting a node's bias during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setBiasInitDistributionType​(NEATConfig.DISTRIBUTION biasInitDistributionType)
    Sets the distribution type for initializing node bias values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setBiasInitMean​(double biasInitMean)
    Sets the mean for initializing node bias values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setBiasInitStdev​(double biasInitStdev)
    Sets the standard deviation for initializing node bias values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setBiasMaxValue​(double biasMaxValue)
    Sets the maximum allowed value for node biases.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setBiasMinValue​(double biasMinValue)
    Sets the minimum allowed value for node biases.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setBiasMutationPower​(double biasMutationPower)
    Sets the power (magnitude) of bias mutations.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setBiasRandomizingRate​(double biasRandomizingRate)
    Sets the probability of completely randomizing a node's bias during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setCompatabilityThresholdAdjustingFactor​(double compatabilityThresholdAdjustingFactor)
    Sets the factor by which to adjust compatibility threshold when using dynamic adjustment.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setCompatibilityDisjointCoefficient​(double compatibilityDisjointCoefficient)
    Sets the coefficient for disjoint genes in compatibility distance calculation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setCompatibilityExcessCoefficient​(double compatibilityExcessCoefficient)
    Sets the coefficient for excess genes in compatibility distance calculation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setCompatibilityThreshold​(double compatibilityThreshold)
    Sets the threshold for genome compatibility determining species membership.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setCompatibilityWeightCoefficient​(double compatibilityWeightCoefficient)
    Sets the coefficient for weight differences in compatibility distance calculation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setDynamicCompatabilityThreshold​(boolean dynamicCompatabilityThreshold)
    Sets whether the compatibility threshold should be adjusted dynamically.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setElitism​(int elitism)
    Sets the number of top performing genomes within each species to preserve unchanged in each generation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setEnabledDefault​(boolean enabledDefault)
    Sets whether new connections are enabled by default.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setEnabledMutationRate​(double enabledMutationRate)
    Sets the probability of toggling a connection's enabled status during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setEnabledRateForDisabled​(double enabledRateForDisabled)
    Sets the additional probability specifically for toggling disabled connections.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setEnabledRateForEnabled​(double enabledRateForEnabled)
    Sets the additional probability specifically for toggling enabled connections.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setFeedForward​(boolean feedForward)
    Sets whether the network must be strictly feed-forward (no recurrent connections).
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setFitnessCriterion​(NEATConfig.FITNESS_CRITERION fitnessCriterion)
    Sets the fitness criterion for the NEAT algorithm.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setFitnessTermination​(boolean fitnessTermination)
    Sets whether the evolution should terminate upon reaching a fitness threshold.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setFitnessTerminationThreshold​(double fitnessThreshold)
    Sets the fitness threshold for termination.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setGenerationTermination​(boolean generationTermination)
    Sets whether the evolution should terminate after a specific number of generations.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setGenerationTerminationThreshold​(int generationThreshold)
    Sets the generation threshold for termination.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setInitConnectivity​(NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY initConnectivity)
    Sets the initial connectivity pattern for new genomes.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setMaxNumberOfHiddenNodes​(int maxNumberOfHiddenNodes)
    Sets the maximum number of hidden nodes allowed in the network (mutation exclusive).
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setProbAddConnection​(double probAddConnection)
    Sets the probability of adding a new connection during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setProbAddNode​(double probAddNode)
    Sets the probability of adding a new node during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setProbConnectInit​(double probConnectInit)
    Sets the probability of creating each connection when using PARTIAL_* connectivity types.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setProbDeleteConnection​(double probDeleteConnection)
    Sets the probability of deleting a connection during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setProbDeleteNode​(double probDeleteNode)
    Sets the probability of deleting a node during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setProbRecurrentConnection​(double probRecurrentConnection)
    Sets the probability that a new connection will be recurrent.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setResponseAdjustingRate​(double responseAdjustingRate)
    Sets the probability of adjusting a node's response during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setResponseInitDistributionType​(NEATConfig.DISTRIBUTION responseInitDistributionType)
    Sets the distribution type for initializing node response values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setResponseInitMean​(double responseInitMean)
    Sets the mean for initializing node response values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setResponseInitStdev​(double responseInitStdev)
    Sets the standard deviation for initializing node response values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setResponseMaxValue​(double responseMaxValue)
    Sets the maximum allowed value for node responses.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setResponseMinValue​(double responseMinValue)
    Sets the minimum allowed value for node responses.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setResponseMutationPower​(double responseMutationPower)
    Sets the power (magnitude) of response mutations.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setResponseRandomizingRate​(double responseRandomizingRate)
    Sets the probability of completely randomizing a node's response during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setSelectionType​(NEATConfig.SELECTION_TYPE selectionType)
    Sets the method used for selecting parent genomes during reproduction.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setSingleStructuralMutation​(boolean singleStructuralMutation)
    Sets whether to allow only one structural mutation per genome per generation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setSpeciesElitism​(int speciesElitism)
    Sets the number of species to preserve even if they stagnate.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setSpeciesFitnessFunction​(NEATConfig.SPECIES_FITNESS_FUNCTION speciesFitnessFunction)
    Sets the method used to calculate species fitness from member genome fitnesses.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setStagnation​(int stagnation)
    Sets the number of generations with no improvement before a species is considered stagnant.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setStartingActivationFunctionForHiddenNodes​(ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION startingActivationFunctionForHiddenNodes)
    Sets the default activation function for new hidden nodes.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setStartingActivationFunctionForOutputNodes​(ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION startingActivationFunctionForOutputNodes)
    Sets the default activation function for new output nodes.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setStartingAggregationFunction​(AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION startingAggregationFunction)
    Sets the default aggregation function for new nodes.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setStartingHiddenNodes​(int... hiddenNodes)
    Sets the array specifying the number of hidden nodes in each hidden layer at initialization.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setStructuralMutationAdvisor​(boolean structuralMutationAdvisor)
    Sets whether to use a structural mutation advisor to guide mutation decisions.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setSurvivalThreshold​(double survivalThreshold)
    Sets the fraction of genomes in each species that are selected for reproduction.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setTargetNumberOfSpecies​(int targetNumberOfSpecies)
    Sets the target number of species when using dynamic compatibility threshold.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setTournamentSize​(int tournamentSize)
    Sets the number of genomes to consider in tournament selection.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setWeightAdjustingRate​(double weightAdjustingRate)
    Sets the probability of adjusting a connection's weight during mutation.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setWeightInitDistributionType​(NEATConfig.DISTRIBUTION weightInitDistributionType)
    Sets the distribution type for initializing connection weight values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setWeightInitMean​(double weightInitMean)
    Sets the mean for initializing connection weight values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setWeightInitStdev​(double weightInitStdev)
    Sets the standard deviation for initializing connection weight values.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setWeightMaxValue​(double weightMaxValue)
    Sets the maximum allowed value for connection weights.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setWeightMinValue​(double weightMinValue)
    Sets the minimum allowed value for connection weights.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setWeightMutationPower​(double weightMutationPower)
    Sets the power (magnitude) of weight mutations.
    NEATConfigBuilder NEATConfigBuilder.setWeightRandomizingRate​(double weightRandomizingRate)
    Sets the probability of completely randomizing a connection's weight during mutation.
